"""
 This script explains how to upgrade bt5. This script only update
 the business templates, nothing else. Any other post script should
 be handle by finalize upgrader.
 """
 # Setup skins
 context.ERP5Site_setupUpgraderSkinSelection()
 
 alarm_dict = context.ERP5Site_getUpgraderSignature.get('alarm_dict', {})
 if not alarm_dict.get(context.getId(), True):
 return False
 
 portal_alarms = context.getPortalObject().portal_alarms
 activate = context.portal_activities.activate
 # Group Messages into the same active process.
 active_process = portal_alarms.upgrader_controller.getLastActiveProcess()
 if active_process is None:
 active_process = context.newActiveProcess()
 
 active_process = active_process.getPath()
 
 message_list = []
 
 system_upgrader_sense = portal_alarms.system_upgrader.sense()
 product_upgrader_sense = portal_alarms.product_upgrader.sense()
 
 if system_upgrader_sense and product_upgrader_sense:
 activate(active_process=active_process,
 activity='SQLQueue',
 priority=2).Alarm_saveActiveResult(
 summary="ERROR: Upgrade BT5 not started",
 severity=0,
 detail='System Upgrader Sense: %s , Product Upgrader Sense : %s' \
 % ( system_upgrader_sense, product_upgrader_sense))
 
 # update existing bt5
 message_list.extend(context.ERP5Site_upgradeBusinessTemplateList(upgrade=1))
 
 activate(active_process=active_process,
 activity='SQLQueue',
 priority=2).Alarm_saveActiveResult(summary="Upgrade BT5 Version",
 severity=0,
 detail='\n'.join(message_list))
 
 return message_list
